constituent: borrow, person, once upon a time, storyteller, salad, sun, day
koohiiStory1: Once upon a time I let Mr T borrow my salad bowl, but he won´t give it back. "This be mine now, foo!".
koohiiStory2: Mr. T borrowed a copy of Cinderella and won´t give it back. He keeps watching it over and over again, trying to figure out how the Fairy Godmother does her magic.
words: borrow, hire, rent, buy on credit
